66d0c1319aba7b6bff460a37 Description: 7.92x57mm Full Metal Jacket (FMJ) is a 198 grain match round with an 8 gram lead core designed to penetrate up to NIJ Level III armor; Intended for hunting, home defense, and target practice, produced by Rifle Line Ammunition. Despite not being a commonly adopted caliber, this cartridge is capable of outputting oustanding damage to its targets.
682e8c4bc098b59f14dde097 Description: 7.92x57mm Soft Point (SP) is a 196 grain round with a soft-point bullet; intended for hunting, home defense, and target practice, produced by Rifle Line Ammunition. 6861847dfd5210a3e64677a3 Description: A surplus variant of the 8mm Mauser FMJ round commonly used during the second World War. Due to it's age and materials, this round may be more likely to jam or damage any weapon it is run though.
684e2ded3b64f7187cf14fae Description: A .300 Winchester Magnum (7.62x67B) FMJ cartridge with a 13.9 gram lead core with a copper jacket and brass casing. 684e2de88bb7e9f52bfab35c Description: A .300 Winchester Magnum (7.62x67B) AP cartridge with a 220-grain Sierra MatchKing bullet. Due to it's hardened core and hard jacket, this round is highly likely to bounce off of various surfaces.
684e2de4c90977ea0b7b83fe Description: A .300 Winchester Magnum (7.62x67B) HP cartridge with a 10.9 gram lead core with a hollow copper tip and brass casing; intended for hunting and target practice, This cartridge is intended for use against Big Game as it has an oustanding stopping power effect and is capable of causing severe damage on the target post-impact and can even pierce some rudimentary ballistic armor.
c556f40e464c7f09d4c757fc Description: A .338 Norma Magnum (8.6x63mm) 300 grain Norma MatchKing Hollow Point Boat Tail round. 678fe4a4906c7bd23722c71f Description: The AN-94 was designed as a potential replacement to the AK-74 series of rifles currently in service with the Russian Armed Forces. Due to its complex design and expense, it failed to fill its intended role as a replacement for the AK-74, but it is in limited use as a special purpose weapon. The AN-94 has the unique feature of delaying felt recoil for the first two rounds. This increases hit probability in adverse combat conditions. The AN-94 offers a unique two-shot burst function at a stated 1800 rounds per minute, with the second shot firing very close to the first round. This feature is often known as the hyperburst mechanism.

6661012d16fbd2fb75408f87 Description: The CZ 75B is a semi-automatic pistol made by Czech firearm manufacturer ZUB. 664274a4d2e5fe0439d545a6 Description: The Heckler & Koch G3 (German: Gewehr 3) is a select-fire battle rifle chambered in 7.62x51mm NATO developed in the 1950s by the German firearms manufacturer Heckler & Koch, in collaboration with the Spanish state-owned firearms manufacturer CETME. The G3 was the service rifle of the German Bundeswehr until it was replaced by the Heckler & Koch G36 in the 1990s, and was adopted into service with numerous other countries. The G3 has been exported to over 70 countries and manufactured under license in at least 15 countries.
664274afd9fe3879695d90e9 Description: The HK21 is a German 7.62x51mm general-purpose machine gun, developed in 1961 by small arms manufacturer Heckler & Koch and based on the G3 battle rifle. The weapon is in use with the armed forces of several Asian, African and Latin American countries. During the 1980s both the HK21A1 and HK11A1 were modernized based on user and testing feedback, resulting in a new modular family of machine guns that share the same receiver, trigger group and interchangeable barrels and feed units. The HK11A1 proved more successful in export sales and was adopted by the Hellenic Army and several African and Asian armies.

677c9a47baecf3c4b2453365 Description: The LAR Grizzly Mark V pistol is a modified Colt M1911 style pistol with oversized components designed to handle larger, more powerful cartridges than could be used in the standard-size 1911 pistol; in this case, .50 Action Express. 664a5b945636ce820472f225 Description: The HK417 is a heavy, fully automatic assault rifle in 7.62x51mm NATO that closes the gap between assault and sniper rifles in the ideal mixture of infantry weapons. 6761b213607f9a6f79017c7e Name: Knight's Armament Company PDW .300 Blackout assault rifle
6761b213607f9a6f79017c7e Description: An experimental personal defense weapon designed by Knight's Armament Company (KAC), firing the .300 BLK cartridge out of an optimized shortened barrel. The KAC's lower receiver, holding the magazine and trigger assembly, is essentially a shortened M16 rifle lower receiver, which makes the basic operating controls familiar to many potential users. However, the cartridge, upper receiver, and operating mechanism are all new designs by KAC. The KAC PDW uses a completely side-folding stock, unlike the M16 and M4 designs which have their main operating spring in a tube in the stock, and therefore can only partially telescope, and not fold sideways at all, unless specialized hardware is installed. The KAC PDW has two gas pistons tapping hot gas from the barrel to operate its mechanism, located on the top left and right sides of the bolt carrier. The single mainspring is located on top, between the two gas pistons.

684e32eaec9f5eb3cacc7ca7 Description: The Modular Sniper Rifle, or MSR, is a bolt-action sniper rifle developed and produced by Remington Arms for the United States Army. It was introduced in 2009, and was designed to meet specific United States Army and USSOCOM Precision Sniper Rifle requirements. The MSR initially won the PSR competition, and was called the Remington Mk 21 Precision Sniper Rifle in U.S. military service. However, it was then decided that the Mk 21 did not conform to SOCOM requirements at the time in 2018, and the program was re-competed with the Barrett MRAD selected in 2019 as the Mk 22 Advanced Sniper Rifle solution.

67a01e4ea2b82626b73d10a3 Description: The Remington ACR is a gas-operated, selective-fire weapon with a modular design. The key idea of the ACR's modular system is that it will provide a wide variety of configurations within a matter of minutes. It is only available for the military and law enforcement market in 5.56x45mm NATO, 7.62x39 mm, 6.8mm Remington SPC and 6.5mm Grendel. It can change caliber in minutes at the user level by changing the bolt head, barrel, and magazine. It was formerly designed by Magpul Industries of Austin, Texas, and known initially as the Masada. Design features from the Armalite AR-18 (short-stroke gas system), the FN SCAR (upper receiver, charging handle location), the Heckler & Koch G36 and XM8 (wide use of polymer components), and the M16/AR-15 (trigger pack, barrel, and fire control group) were present.

68433b58a8f9a618b11082d4 Description: The UCP (short for Universal Combat Pistol, also known as the P46) is a prototype double-action, semi-automatic pistol that was developed by Heckler & Koch under commission for the Bundeswehr. The UCP operates by roller-delayed blowback. The external design of the weapon appears to have been borrowed from the P2000, including ambidextrous controls, interchangeable backstraps, and a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail for accessories. It was designed to be the companion sidearm to the MP7 PDW, using the same 4.6×30mm bottlenecked cartridge. In this sense, the UCP was a competitor to FN Herstal's Five-seveN in the same context that the MP7 rivals the P90.

68677d09339b397ed3d37522 Description: The SR-2 Udav (Удав - “Boa”, GRAU Index - 6P72) is a Russian 9×21mm short-recoil-operated semi-automatic pistol. It was released by Central Scientific - Research Institute of Precision Machine Engineering (TsNIITochMash) in 2019 as a replacement for the Makarov PM for the Russian military and passed military trials the month following its release date. The design has many improvements over the Makarov including a polymer frame with better texturing for more comfort, ambidextrous controls, a dedicated accessory rail built into the frame, and removable sights to offer more flexibility than its predecessor.

687314e1ee500b06711955a2 description: Greetings comrade. When the blockade kicked off and most of the reserve base boys ditched the place Glukhar and his crew of scavengers busted into the weapons testing area and grabbed whatever they could get their filthy hands on. Most of that gear is long gone, used up or trashed. But word is the scraps they left behind are about to be moved. Glukhar’s planning to spread his rot further across our land.
687314e1ee500b06711955a2 startedMessageT: I need you to hit the 3rd floor Armory in the Black Pawn building. Find whatever’s left of what those thieves took. That’s government property and it belongs back with us. The issue is that things are a little too hot right now so I will need you to stash the prototype in the black SUV at the USEC Camp over at the Priozersk Nature Reserve. Once my guys retrieve it, my garrison will make sure you get a fat payday for your trouble.
687314e1ee500b06711955a2 successMessageT: Nice work warrior. You pulled those goods out before Glukhar’s dogs could move them. Our homeland owes you one. Here’s your cut. Now get lost.
6876ee191ff3fb6115656aff: Survive and extract from the location
6873248b615c003311ebb292 description: "Yo, merc, got a weird one for ya. Some high-roller client of mine’s got a hard-on for his old-school stuff, and he’s paying big to get it back. He’s after some old game console and a bootleg Star Wars DVD he stashed somewhere at the Health Resort. Problem is, I was three vodkas deep when he told me the room number, so I got no clue where exactly. You’ll need to sniff around the resort’s fancy suites y’know, the ones with the plush carpets and overpriced views. Once you’ve nabbed the goods, drop ‘em off at the mini theater in Interchange, in the back somewhere by the poster he said. Don’t even think about popping that DVD in for a watch or selling it for a quick buck, don't try fucking with that  game console either. This guy’s obsessive, and I ain’t dealing with his tantrums. They're messy; do this clean, and we’ll talk more work."
6873248b615c003311ebb292 startedMessageT: Good Luck out there. Try not to die over this.
6873248b615c003311ebb292 successMessageT: Well, damn, merc, you actually pulled it off! Found that console and dvd, huh? Not bad for a glorified scavenger. Dropped ‘em off at the mini theater like I asked, too? My client’s gonna be over the moon, probably crying into his vintage popcorn. You’ve got some skills, operator. Stick around, nice to have someone that don't fuck up a simple fetch job. Now go clean your gear or something.
686fb59d8b0538a76b923998: Find the bootleg DVD at the Health Resort
687309c0742d221499ecb69e: Find the game console at the Health Resort
68730b8f645d8547cbf06740: Place the bootlegged DVD at the mini theater on Interchange
68730c98c6a9aafc1a8c2078: Place the game console at the mini theater on Interchange
686051774a290eb6f216471f description: I tracked down tracked down a shipment of NATO weapons that was delivered to Customs. We aren't sure what the weapons are, but I want you to go and track them down and mark the shipment for me!
686051774a290eb6f216471f startedMessageT: Get your ass out there and find that shipment!
686051774a290eb6f216471f successMessageT: Great work on finding that shipment. Turns out that the weapons were absolute garbage!! You can keep two for yourself and I guess I will just sell the rest. Thanks again I suppose.
6860529aac68575f65f0578e: Place a MS2000 Marker on the boxes in the basement of Fortress near the extraction point.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 description: Good afternoon Mercenary. We’ve got a messy situation brewing. Those hostile factions out in Woods are hitting our UN aid convoys hard. The world needs to see it plain and clear. I want you to plant three UNTAR tags near their hotspots. Stick them on some executed bodies. Once the news catches wind that BEAR and USEC are butchering blue helmets donations to our operations will pour in. It’s about saving lives through the right kind of spotlight.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 startedMessageT: Get those tags planted and stage the bodies clean. Then disappear. If anyone traces this back or you get caught you’re just a lone wolf acting on your own.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 successMessageT: The press is eating it up. Stories about PMC atrocities are everywhere. Geneva’s screaming for blood and our funding’s locked in tight. Nice work Mercenary. Here’s your pay.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 failMessageText: You compromised the operation. UNTAR is breathing down my neck. If you can't handle the work, don't take the job.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 acceptPlayerMes: This isn’t deception - it’s documenting atrocities they’d commit anyway. Get to Woods.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 declinePlayerMe: Not interested? Fine. When UNTAR finally gets pushed out, and the scavs are beating down the door to your hideout? Don't call me begging for help.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 completePlayerM: Perfect. If you setup the scene well enough, the world will see the atrocities BEAR and USEC are doing - even if we had to rely on some fabrication.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 note: Plant UNTAR dog tags on bodies in Woods. Be sure to remain unseen.
6833b5381f542c94c22a2381: Plant UNTAR Dog Tag on dead body at the South-Eastern Bridge, next to the utility shed
6833b53a7e7e09c54a256827: Plant UNTAR Dog Tag on dead body inside the Western shed of the ruined town in the South
6833b53c406cbfdf307f0e05: Plant UNTAR Dog Tag on dead body leaning against Electric Tower before the Northern lakes
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 description: Our Swedish pals seem to have lost a hard drive during their little "audit" of Tarkov’s relief operations. Go fetch it from their abandoned armored vehicle out in the Streets. That drive’s got some juicy details: tax havens, embargoed tech deals, shipping manifests... Get it to me and we could nudge Stockholm into redirecting some UN aid budgets our way. Wouldn’t it be a pity if their shady deals with TerraGroup got out?
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 startedMessageT: The vehicle’s parked near Concordia. Watch out for private militia crawling around. Take them out quietly. If that drive’s busted you might as well not come back.
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 successMessageT: Stockholm just coughed up 10000 antibiotic doses and tossed in some spare munitions after I dropped a few hints from the files. Such generous folks they are. Here’s your cut.
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 acceptPlayerMes: Just be sure to get that drive back to me intact. If we play our cards right, this should be a decent payday.
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 declinePlayerMe: Really? You're that scared of some action in the Streets? Didn't take you for a coward.
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 completePlayerM: Another successful op in the books. We make quite the convincing argument for the cause. Check my stores next time you're around - the Swedes sent us some new shiny metal toys to pay for our silence.
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 note: Obtain the Swedish intel drive from armored vehicle on Streets of Tarkov
68363e9928ef789b2ccf31a1: Obtain the hard drive from the APC near the helicopter crash site on Streets of Tarkov
688e490c1b91472219274c2b: Hand over the hard drive to Peacekeeper
686c25d281071c45d2f8aa44 description: Good afternoon Mercenary. We’ve got a problem that needs fixing fast. I secured a shipment of M249 SAWs but my team got hit during delivery. Some of those weapons were snatched. Worse yet the manifest listing every gun got lost in the chaos. I need that paperwork to know exactly what’s missing. Head to the Tigr LAV by the main bridge on Customs. That’s your best bet to find it. Clear?
686c25d281071c45d2f8aa44 startedMessageT: Move quick and grab that manifest. I need it back here yesterday.
686c25d281071c45d2f8aa44 successMessageT: Well done Mercenary. You pulled through with that manifest. Now I can sort this mess out. Here’s your reward. Expect more work soon.
686c26481432fe3c84301de9: Obtain the shipping manifest near the Tigr LAV at the main bridge on Customs
686c26d2392f65d4890af76f: Survive and extract from the location
686c26dc34ec5f932401b002: Hand over the shipping manifest to Peacekeeper
686dd4f871840e292fbd1a14 description: Those fucking bastards! I believe I know who attacked my convoy that was carrying my shipment of the M249 SAW! One of my guys told me it looked like a small group of Ex-USEC guys. I need you to go back to Customs and take care of them for me while I figure out why the fuck they stole my guns. I bet those bastards have them stashed somewhere.
686dd4f871840e292fbd1a14 startedMessageT: Go get them, make them pay for even thinking they can intercept my gear.
686dd4f871840e292fbd1a14 successMessageT: Good fucking work. I'll be honest, I didn't think you would pull this off. Take this reward for helping me out, I already lost a few of these so what is one more right?
6870170d18b94df2e8700ba0 description: Alright Mercenary, we got more work. While you were out playing shadow my guy was poking around Customs tracking down my stolen guns. Turns out those bastards stashed them in crates tucked away on some storage shelves in a damn corner. They better not have messed with my gear.
6870170d18b94df2e8700ba0 startedMessageT: Head over and mark those crates so I can get my stuff back. Don’t let me down. Check near the big red building!
6870170d18b94df2e8700ba0 successMessageT: Nice job getting those crates marked. Looks like those Stray Dogs were trying to cook up something slick with my guns. Here’s your reward, take it.
687018c3dc52ab57b5e38363: Locate and mark the boxes of stolen M249 SAWs with an MS2000 Marker on Customs
6877096d5299037a1c4b7b2f description: Here is the scoop - I got some weapons in, but I need someone to do a little bit of testing for me to see if they are worth it. You are the best man for the job, so take this gun and go kill some Scavs for me. This should be pretty easy for you. I will give you some cash also for doing so. Good luck!
6877096d5299037a1c4b7b2f startedMessageT: Thanks for doing this soldier. These guns better be worth it!
6877096d5299037a1c4b7b2f successMessageT: Perfect! They look like they will do just fine out in the field! I will get more ordered and I will see what else I can get ordered for you to try.
68770a9b8cc4478bd88d86ca: Eliminate 5 Scavs on Reserve using the Ak5C 5.56x45 assault rifle
68782def57bd3034268c3345: Eliminate 5 Scavs on Ground Zero using the Ak5C 5.56x45 assault rifle
68784cf8dbe00560604d51e1 description: Hello again. It looks like I can get more variants of the gun I had you test. I am gonna ask again if you can run a few tests for me again, but this time I want the test to be bit harder. Go kill PMC's in certain areas of Tarkov.
68784cf8dbe00560604d51e1 startedMessageT: As always, thanks again for being my test subject.
68784cf8dbe00560604d51e1 successMessageT: Awesome work! Here is a little extra for your help.
68784e212b1bbf5869da98b4: Eliminate 10 PMCs on Interchange using the Ak5D 5.56x45 assault rifle
68784de02c61f26ddb77ba10: Eliminate 10 PMCs on Woods using the Ak5D 5.56x45 assault rifle
68784e80440f9c9295379b61: Eliminate 10 PMCs on Factory using the Ak5D 5.56x45 assault rifle
68784e5bb547b5aef5a5be26: Eliminate 10 PMCs on Shoreline using the Ak5D 5.56x45 assault rifle
6879a0da60f8d8a90e632755 description: Alright, Merc. I have one more task for you. I got the other shipments of those weapons you tested for purchase. The last thing I am going to ask is you to kill more PMCs, but this time at night. If this goes well I can get one more variant of the weapon and this one looks badass.
6879a0da60f8d8a90e632755 startedMessageT: I am counting on you. Do this and I will reward you well.
6879a0da60f8d8a90e632755 successMessageT: Hell yeah! Here, take this for payment - I will get a shipment of these weapons ready to distribute soon!
6879a222a8d2ec1d371514d0: Eliminate 20 PMCs between the hours of 21:00 and 6:00 using the Ak5C or Ak5D assault rifles (Excluding Factory)
68561cd4801134be939e11f6 description: Hello mercenary. You know how memories creep up from the old days. Back when I was running things at the Factory I overheard my boss talking about a rare antique smoothbore pistol. Kept it in a fancy display case. Word is it was gifted to some accountant he dealt with. I want that piece for myself now. Something about the craft of it calls to me. Check the Black Knight building over in Military Reserve. That's where that accountant's office used to be. Find it and bring it back. I’ll make it worth your while.
68561cd4801134be939e11f6 startedMessageT: Hey mercenary. Like I mentioned that accountant’s office should be somewhere in the Black Knight building. Probably up on the top floor. Look for a sign or something marking the door. Keep your eyes sharp.
68561cd4801134be939e11f6 successMessageT: This is going to make a great part of my collection! Crafts like that are hard to come by.
68561b99da76e0be82eb3866: Find the Antique Pistol Case located in the Senior Accountant's office located in Black Knight.
6859fed30c78167809e1d370: Survive and extract from the location
687b616db015c21f329bf45f description: Come in, have a seat. I’ve got something unusual for you today. Sergey’s buried in his own work, tinkering with some high-priority builds. He asked me to deal with it, but I’m stretched thin keeping the reserve in check. Looters are crawling all over, and I’m out here playing whack-a-mole with them, so I’m passing this to you. There’s an AN94 stashed out there, left by someone who wants to stay in the shadows. No names, no details, just how they like it. The rifle’s hidden somewhere at the old makeshift military base near the lake. There’s a list of attachments and mods they want on it. I trust you to get it done right and not run off with the gun.  Get it done, and bring it back to me. I’ll make sure it gets to where it’s supposed to go.
687b616db015c21f329bf45f startedMessageT: Watch your back out there. The woods are crawling with scavs, and they’d love to get their hands on a prize like that. Move quick, stay sharp.
687b616db015c21f329bf45f successMessageT: Impressive work. Let me see it...Clean job. You followed the specs to the letter. I’ve got some extra gear stashed away, good stuff from the reserve. You earned it. Oh, Sergey said you should go by and see him, he's got some new wares you might be interested in.
687b573e9a195e91cdbfeb3e: Find the parts list left by Mechanic's client.

68c23b960f579b9b5fe021e7 Description: The AG-042 was a Soviet compact fully automatic assault rifle chambered for the 5.45x39mm round, developed in 1974 by Sergei Simonov. The rifle was designed after the GRAU launched Project Modern. The Soviet contest for this design was eventually won out by Kalashnikov's AKS-74U.
68c23b3d4a286357245eb641 Description: A standard ramp-type rear sight for the AG-042 and AG-043 assault rifles.
68c63ee6dcb5f65309eb4fcc Description: A standard muzzle brake device for the AG-042 and AG-043 assault rifles.
68b7f4060a4536984f82cf4b Description: The HK MK23 is a semi-automatic large-frame pistol chambered in .45 ACP, designed specifically to be an offensive pistol. The USSOCOM version of the MK23 came paired with a laser aiming module (LAM) and suppressor. The USSOCOM MK23 was adopted by the United States Special Operations Command (USSOCOM) for special operations units, beating out the nearest competitor, Colt's OHWS. Development of the pistol began in 1991 as special operations representatives identified the need for an Offensive Handgun Weapons System—Special Operations Peculiar, and delivery of the pistols began in May 1996 to the special operation units.

68b9cf84c826940d2b684dad Description: A laser aiming module (LAM) designed and manufactured by Insight Technology for use by United States Special Operations Command (USSOCOM) with the Heckler & Koch Mark 23 semi-automatic pistol. It consists of a laser projector on the left side of the LAM and two tactical flashlights on the right side. One setting of the laser produces a visible light dot, while the other setting produces infrared (IR) light. The illuminator section has a rectangular white light flashlight on the upper part and a rectangular infrared flashlight on the lower part. The IR elements can only be seen whilst wearing night vision goggles.

68cf56067ff6ceab0c2fd49e Description: The AG-043 was a Soviet compact fully automatic assault rifle chambered for the 5.45x39mm round, developed in 1974 by Sergei Simonov. The rifle was designed after the GRAU launched Project Modern. The Soviet contest for this design was eventually won out by Kalashnikov's AKS-74U.

68d3f708c61fce2651e9e9ac Description: A 9x18mm Makarov cartridge with a solid steel flat nose bullet coated with "Hi-Tek" polymer based coating that reduces fouling in the barrel.  The hard cast flat nose bullet is a non-expanding, powerfully penetrative bullet that is designed with woods defense needs in mind.  Whether fending off wild hogs or black bears, the hard cast flat nose bullets are consistently effective in taking down any encountered wild animals.

68fd4feab87d77a5aaf6bf64 Description: The CheyTac Intervention, also known as the CheyTac M200, is an American bolt-action sniper rifle manufactured by CheyTac USA, which can also be classified as an anti-materiel rifle. It is fed by a seven-round detachable single-stack magazine (an optional five-round magazine is also available). CheyTac Inc. states that the system is capable of delivering sub-MOA accuracy at ranges of up to 2,500 yd (2,286 m).

68e0002a0d6a4dab56810fbd Description: The Valmet M78 is the RPK-style heavy barreled squad support weapon pattern of the Finnish AK. It was initially developed as the M74 cavalry machine gun for Finnish military service, but never adopted. If it had, it would have been chambered for 7.62x39mm. For export, the company offered that caliber as well as 5.56x45mm and 7.62x51mm. That experimental design would serve as the basis for the commercial export M78. Because these were imported before 1986, it was legal to manufacture them into transferrable machine guns. -Ian McCollum

66d0c1319aba7b6bff460a37 description: 7.92x57mm Full Metal Jacket (FMJ) is a 198 grain match round with an 8 gram lead core designed to penetrate up to NIJ Level III armor; Intended for hunting, home defense, and target practice, produced by Rifle Line Ammunition. Despite not being a commonly adopted caliber, this cartridge is capable of outputting oustanding damage to its targets.
682e8c4bc098b59f14dde097 description: 7.92x57mm Soft Point (SP) is a 196 grain round with a soft-point bullet; intended for hunting, home defense, and target practice, produced by Rifle Line Ammunition. This round, despite it's aim towards flesh-based target, is still plenty capable at penetrating most soft armors.
6861847dfd5210a3e64677a3 description: A surplus variant of the 8mm Mauser FMJ round commonly used during the second World War. Due to it's age and materials, this round may be more likely to jam or damage any weapon it is run though.
684e2ded3b64f7187cf14fae description: A .300 Winchester Magnum (7.62x67B) FMJ cartridge with a 13.9 gram lead core with a copper jacket and brass casing. Despite it's simplicity, this round proves plenty capable of piercing simple to intermediate ballistic armor, as well as having considerable stopping power; however, this also means the round has a high probability of bouncing off various surfaces.
684e2de88bb7e9f52bfab35c description: A .300 Winchester Magnum (7.62x67B) AP cartridge with a 220-grain Sierra MatchKing bullet. This cartridge was designed to penetrate intermediate (and greater) ballistic armor all the way up to some lightly armored vehicles. Due to it's hardened core and hard jacket, this round is highly likely to bounce off of various surfaces.
684e2de4c90977ea0b7b83fe description: A .300 Winchester Magnum (7.62x67B) HP cartridge with a 10.9 gram lead core with a hollow copper tip and brass casing; intended for hunting and target practice, This cartridge is intended for use against Big Game as it has an oustanding stopping power effect and is capable of causing severe damage on the target post-impact and can even pierce some rudimentary ballistic armor.
c556f40e464c7f09d4c757fc description:
A .338 Norma Magnum (8.6x63mm) 300-grain Norma Golden Target HPBT precision cartridge.
Engineered for extreme long-range accuracy, this boat-tail match projectile emphasizes ballistic coefficient, wind stability, and consistent shot-to-shot performance. It is not designed for rapid expansion, but its mass and sectional density allow it to retain energy exceptionally well downrange. Manufactured with premium Norma brass and optimized for professional marksman platforms.
ea4cdb6fc3dd4f799eeef33e description:
A .338 Norma Magnum (8.6x63mm) 250-grain Sierra MatchKing HPBT precision cartridge loaded in high-quality match brass.
The MatchKing series is a gold standard among competitive shooters and long-range specialists, built for minimum drag, superb accuracy, and stable supersonic flight at extreme distances. While not built for terminal expansion, its ballistic efficiency and penetration performance make it a formidable choice for precision shooters engaging hardened or distant targets.
68d3f708c61fce2651e9e9ac description: A 9x18mm Makarov cartridge with a solid steel flat nose bullet coated with "Hi-Tek" polymer based coating that reduces fouling in the barrel.  The hard cast flat nose bullet is a non-expanding, powerfully penetrative bullet that is designed with woods defense needs in mind.  Whether fending off wild hogs or black bears, the hard cast flat nose bullets are consistently effective in taking down any encountered wild animals.
68fd537f2965f74cf4a87894 description: A .408 Cheyenne Tactical (10.36x77mm) FMJ cartridge with a 22.5 gram bullet. Each round is carefully engineered to achieve optimal ballistic performance, offering superior trajectory and minimal wind drift.

6941ef6424ad69dcab0d9a64 description: The .44 Magnum cartridge was the result of years of tuned handloading of the .44 Special. One of these hand-loaders was Elmer Keith, a prominent writer and outdoorsman of the 20th century.

678fe4a4906c7bd23722c71f description: The AN-94 was designed as a potential replacement to the AK-74 series of rifles currently in service with the Russian Armed Forces. Due to its complex design and expense, it failed to fill its intended role as a replacement for the AK-74, but it is in limited use as a special purpose weapon. The AN-94 has the unique feature of delaying felt recoil for the first two rounds. This increases hit probability in adverse combat conditions. The AN-94 offers a unique two-shot burst function at a stated 1800 rounds per minute, with the second shot firing very close to the first round. This feature is often known as the hyperburst mechanism.

68fd4feab87d77a5aaf6bf64 description: The CheyTac Intervention, also known as the CheyTac M200, is an American bolt-action sniper rifle manufactured by CheyTac USA, which can also be classified as an anti-materiel rifle. It is fed by a seven-round detachable single-stack magazine (an optional five-round magazine is also available). CheyTac Inc. states that the system is capable of delivering sub-MOA accuracy at ranges of up to 2,500 yd (2,286 m).

6661012d16fbd2fb75408f87 description: The CZ 75B is a semi-automatic pistol made by Czech firearm manufacturer ZUB. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original 'wonder nines' and features a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world and is the most common handgun in the Czech Republic.

It is widely distributed throughout the world and is the most common handgun in the Czech Republic. The CZ 75B Omega has a more refined trigger mechanism over the standard CZ 75B.

687afda52dc9fd6c0e14c602 description: The CZ Scorpion EVO 3 is a 9mm carbine manufactured by Česká zbrojovka Uherský Brod, the select-fire submachine gun variant is designated A1, and the semi-automatic variant is designated S1. The EVO 3 designation denotes that the firearm is a third generation of CZ's line of small submachine guns started by the Škorpion vz. 61, which is mechanically unrelated.

677c9a47baecf3c4b2453365 name: LAR Grizzly 50 Mark V .50 AE pistol
677c9a47baecf3c4b2453365 description: The LAR Grizzly Mark V pistol is a modified Colt M1911 style pistol with oversized components designed to handle larger, more powerful cartridges than could be used in the standard-size 1911 pistol; in this case, .50 Action Express. The original prototype built by Perry Arnett was made from two Colt 1911 frames and slides cut and welded to accommodate the .45 Winchester Magnum round, with two steel doubler plates welded to the slide flats to retard the action and increase strength.

664a5b945636ce820472f225 description: The HK417 is a heavy, fully automatic assault rifle in 7.62x51mm NATO that closes the gap between assault and sniper rifles in the ideal mixture of infantry weapons. The indirect gas-operated weapon achieves energy values of 2500 to 3100 joules in its calibre, depending on ammunition and barrel length. Sufficient energy to effectively engage targets beyond 500 metres.

6761b213607f9a6f79017c7e name: Knight's Armament Company PDW .300 Blackout assault rifle
6761b213607f9a6f79017c7e description: An experimental personal defense weapon designed by Knight's Armament Company (KAC), firing the .300 BLK cartridge out of an optimized shortened barrel. The KAC's lower receiver, holding the magazine and trigger assembly, is essentially a shortened M16 rifle lower receiver, which makes the basic operating controls familiar to many potential users. However, the cartridge, upper receiver, and operating mechanism are all new designs by KAC. The KAC PDW uses a completely side-folding stock, unlike the M16 and M4 designs which have their main operating spring in a tube in the stock, and therefore can only partially telescope, and not fold sideways at all, unless specialized hardware is installed. The KAC PDW has two gas pistons tapping hot gas from the barrel to operate its mechanism, located on the top left and right sides of the bolt carrier. The single mainspring is located on top, between the two gas pistons.

66e718dc498d978477e0ba75 description: The M249 SAW (Squad Automatic Weapon) is a gas operated and air cooled light machinegun widely used by the U.S. Armed Forces. The weapon was introduced in 1984 to address a lack of sustained automatic fire capability at the squad level. The M249 SAW combines the rate of fire of a machine gun with the accuracy and portability of an assault rifle.

66e88596febdcf9daade16a8 description: The Zastava M76 is a military semi-automatic designated marksman rifle developed and manufactured by Zastava Arms. The Zastava Arms Company released the M76 in the mid-1970s. Since then it became the standard issue designated marksman rifle in the Serbian army and its predecessor the Yugoslav People's Army (JNA). It was designed to fulfill the same role as the Soviet Dragunov SVD, which was to provide a designated marksman capability to the infantry platoon.

68e0002a0d6a4dab56810fbd description: The Valmet M78 is the RPK-style heavy barreled squad support weapon pattern of the Finnish AK. It was initially developed as the M74 cavalry machine gun for Finnish military service, but never adopted. If it had, it would have been chambered for 7.62x39mm. For export, the company offered that caliber as well as 5.56x45mm and 7.62x51mm. That experimental design would serve as the basis for the commercial export M78. Because these were imported before 1986, it was legal to manufacture them into transferrable machine guns. -Ian McCollum

68b7f4060a4536984f82cf4b description: The HK MK23 is a semi-automatic large-frame pistol chambered in .45 ACP, designed specifically to be an offensive pistol. The USSOCOM version of the MK23 came paired with a laser aiming module (LAM) and suppressor. The USSOCOM MK23 was adopted by the United States Special Operations Command (USSOCOM) for special operations units, beating out the nearest competitor, Colt's OHWS. Development of the pistol began in 1991 as special operations representatives identified the need for an Offensive Handgun Weapons System—Special Operations Peculiar, and delivery of the pistols began in May 1996 to the special operation units.

68b9cf84c826940d2b684dad description: A laser aiming module (LAM) designed and manufactured by Insight Technology for use by United States Special Operations Command (USSOCOM) with the Heckler & Koch Mark 23 semi-automatic pistol. It consists of a laser projector on the left side of the LAM and two tactical flashlights on the right side. One setting of the laser produces a visible light dot, while the other setting produces infrared (IR) light. The illuminator section has a rectangular white light flashlight on the upper part and a rectangular infrared flashlight on the lower part. The IR elements can only be seen whilst wearing night vision goggles.

684e32eaec9f5eb3cacc7ca7 description: The Modular Sniper Rifle, or MSR, is a bolt-action sniper rifle developed and produced by Remington Arms for the United States Army. It was introduced in 2009, and was designed to meet specific United States Army and USSOCOM Precision Sniper Rifle requirements. The MSR initially won the PSR competition, and was called the Remington Mk 21 Precision Sniper Rifle in U.S. military service. However, it was then decided that the Mk 21 did not conform to SOCOM requirements at the time in 2018, and the program was re-competed with the Barrett MRAD selected in 2019 as the Mk 22 Advanced Sniper Rifle solution.

692f77045371aadbbb0ada2e description: The Ruger-5.7 is a semi-automatic pistol introduced in December 2019 by Sturm, Ruger & Co. It is the first traditionally-styled semi-automatic pistol to be chambered for the 5.7×28mm cartridge since the introduction of the Excel Arms MP-57 in 2012. Safety features include: 1911-style ambidextrous manual safety; an integrated trigger safety; light-weight firing pin; neutrally balanced sear with significant engagement and strong spring tension; and hammer catch to help prevent the hammer from contacting the firing pin unless the trigger is pulled.
692f77045371aadbbb0ada30 description: Through hardened, billet steel slide with lightening cuts is drilled and tapped for easy mounting of optics with separately available optic adapter plate.

69236a0b2d1260dbca41ef92 description: An upgraded SV-98 variant developed by Izhmash featuring an adjustable aluminum skeleton type stock. Izhmash expected the upgraded variant to be more economical to produce and offer improved maintainability and accuracy of fire. In 2017 Kalashnikov Concern took over production of the SV-98.
68433b58a8f9a618b11082d4 description: The UCP (short for Universal Combat Pistol, also known as the P46) is a prototype double-action, semi-automatic pistol that was developed by Heckler & Koch under commission for the Bundeswehr. The UCP operates by roller-delayed blowback. The external design of the weapon appears to have been borrowed from the P2000, including ambidextrous controls, interchangeable backstraps, and a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail for accessories. It was designed to be the companion sidearm to the MP7 PDW, using the same 4.6×30mm bottlenecked cartridge. In this sense, the UCP was a competitor to FN Herstal's Five-seveN in the same context that the MP7 rivals the P90.

68677d09339b397ed3d37522 description: The SR-2 Udav (Удав - “Boa”, GRAU Index - 6P72) is a Russian 9×21mm short-recoil-operated semi-automatic pistol. It was released by Central Scientific - Research Institute of Precision Machine Engineering (TsNIITochMash) in 2019 as a replacement for the Makarov PM for the Russian military and passed military trials the month following its release date. The design has many improvements over the Makarov including a polymer frame with better texturing for more comfort, ambidextrous controls, a dedicated accessory rail built into the frame, and removable sights to offer more flexibility than its predecessor.

6945dc69fe52c2415de357f7 description: The Barrett XM109, originally known as the Objective Sniper Weapon (OSW) and now called the Anti-Materiel Payload Rifle (AMPR), is a prototype semi-automatic grenade launcher. It is chambered for 25 x 59 mm grenade rounds and was developed by Barrett Firearms Manufacturing. It was designed in accordance with a requirement set out in 1994, and is capable of defeating light armor and equipment out to 2 km (1.2 miles).

6920a431c8f2ed5000c540a0 description: The XM8 is a lightweight assault rifle system developed in the 1990's by Heckler & Koch as a replacement for the M4. While it would ultimately not be accepted, the XM8 is a reliable, light, and modular weapon. How it came to Tarkov is unknown, but it is a welcome addition.

694dc176d149fc1d52000003 description: Hey merc, we've got an issue. As usual it's money, but don't worry I'm not asking you for more at the moment. You can fill our coffers as needed another way. You see as of right now my... management doesn't see things here as particularly noteworthy or dangerous. I'd like to put a bug in their ear with evidence to prove that we need some heavier firepower to protect us in the region. I'm thinking some standard shells for the BTR I've seen wandering around the area should disappear from the reserve base arsenal and reappear at the place where the BTR stops a couple hundred meters north of the sawmill. You might find some around their motorpool, they have to unload the guns to work on them after all. As always, you'll find your pockets full after the fact. See to it.

69555be939fb0a1a6f0ad12e description: The A-545 was announced as a successor line of sorts to the AEK-971 and AEK-973 assault rifle lines which saw limited service with Russian forces. The A-545 was tested against the AK-12 during state Ratnik Trials, at which point the weapon was said to be good enough to be entered into service for evaluation purposes by 2015 at least.
